name: Social Distance Delivery (Ansley Partosa)
description:
This game was created for the Quarantine Game Jam hosted by the Greater Gaming Society of San Antonio! The theme was Isolation, so we created a game based off of a Tiktok where a guy is trying to woo a girl dancing on a distant building in the city by sending her gifts with his drone.

Art: Ansley Partosa, Angelica Gonzales, John Ledesma

Programming: Ansley Partosa

Music: Danipersonmusic

Voices: Ricardo Berrios

Font Credit & Permission: Darrel flood

This is a re-upload by the programmer! Original upload by John Ledesma. I'm pretty proud of this one, because this was my first game jam I was the main programmer. Possible updates in the future?
